text: @CyrilRamaphosa Mr President sir why not stop heavy haulage trucks for a week or so so many truck drivers suspected of covid19 and spreading it in truck stops and 1 stops not knowing they are infected companies are so happy that their business is going well as usual not to worry about the rest
